content: I'm also focusing on finishing the tests tomorrow, I underestimated the 7702 changes, that new special case came out of nowhere ðŸ˜…

author: jochembrouwer

author: jochembrouwer
content: We have some devnet-4 changes here: https://github.com/ethereumjs/ethereumjs-monorepo/pull/3706 am checking if these are up-to-date regarding the system contracts + flat requests. I think we only need 7702 changes. Will then try to fill & cross-validate the tests ðŸ™‚

author: marioevz
content: Let me push the latest changes

author: marioevz
content:
These are the only changes to the t8n interface here: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/832/files#diff-9b1e5f20d240e7346d316dac8e70566c68d5753b33a09db49d801bf7e79199b8

Replaced deposits+withdrawals+consolidations with a single field called `requests` that expects a list of byte arrays.

author: jochembrouwer
content: I see, and a `requestsHash` field

author: jochembrouwer
content: Yes makes sense, `requests` raw list of byte arrays and then `requestsHash` whatever the requests list RLP hash it is. Should be simple change to the t8n implementation on our side
